translation.en: [woman over radio] Someone is calling you home...
♪ 'Cause it's another day For you and me in paradise ♪
translation.zh:
‎（90年代初
‎在前往洛杉矶的路上）

translation.en: -[man] Hey, what's up? -Code.
translation.zh:
‎（罗伊哈达威
‎田纳西州生存指南） ‎-喂？
‎-寇德

translation.en: -Yeah? -It's good to hear your voice.
translation.zh:
‎-是我
‎-真高兴能听到你的声音

translation.en: Holy shit. Lisa?
Are you okay? I haven't heard from you in months.
translation.zh:
‎你还好吗？
‎我已经好几个月没有你的消息了

translation.en: I was afraid you were dead.
[Lisa] I've been up in the woods working on that short film I told you about.
translation.zh: ‎我一直在丛林里拍我提过的那部电影

translation.en: Must have lost track of time.
Yeah. I know how you get. So you back in New York?
translation.zh:
‎我了解你对工作很投入
‎你回纽约了？

translation.en: I'm an hour outside L.A.
translation.zh: ‎我离洛杉矶还有一个小时车程

translation.en: Wait, what?
Do you know the name Lou Burke?
Lou Burke? Yeah, of course I do.
Apparently, he wants to meet with me.
Lis, that's huge.
Listen, I need a place to crash. Can I use your couch?
translation.zh:
‎听着 我想要借宿一宿
‎我睡在你沙发上吗？

translation.en: Are you kidding? Yeah, of course. Anything you need.
I'm at 4837 Traction, downtown.
I knew I could count on you.
-I'm glad you're not dead. -Me too. See you soon, Code.
translation.zh:
‎-你没事儿我太高兴了
‎-我也是 待会儿见 寇德

translation.en: ♪ I'm the one, natural one, make it easy ♪
[Lisa] How's your band doing? -Heard you're selling drugs now, too. -Shh!
translation.zh:
‎你的乐队怎么样
‎我听说你也在卖毒品

translation.en: [whispering] Christine's asleep.
-Who the fuck is Christine? -My girlfriend. She lives here too.
translation.zh:
‎-克莉丝汀是哪个鸟？
‎-我的女朋友 她也住在这儿

translation.en: Your-- Is she gonna mind me being here?
No, no, no. I mean...
translation.zh: ‎不 不会的 我觉得应该没事儿

translation.en: -No, I'm sure it'll be fine. -[chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎不 不会的 我觉得应该没事儿 ‎我的意思是
‎你和所有人都合得来 不是吗？

translation.en: I mean, you get along with everybody, right?
translation.zh:
‎我的意思是
‎你和所有人都合得来 不是吗？

translation.en: You said, you'd never come to L.A.
translation.zh: ‎你说过你永远不会来洛杉矶

translation.en: Guess I changed my mind.
Your actress friend didn't wanna come?
Something happen in the woods?
You know. People tend to get fucked up around me.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 我身边的人都容易倒霉

translation.en: Not me.
You want this?
-Nah, I'm good. -Thank you.
-Night. -Goodnight.
-So you used to date my boyfriend. -I wouldn't say date exactly.
translation.zh:
‎-你和我男朋友交往过？
‎-不算交往

translation.en: It looked like you were sleeping with your eyes open. It was gross.
translation.zh: ‎你睡觉的时候睁着眼睛 好恶心

translation.en: Sorry.
So he said you might need to crash here for a minute or so,
and I'm totally good with that if you do.
translation.zh: ‎如果你想的话我完全没意见

translation.en: Just... If you wanna take a shower,
use the hallway bathroom, not the one by our bedroom.
translation.zh: ‎用走廊里的那个 别用卧室旁边的

translation.en: And sometimes when you pull the thingy for the shower,
seems like nothing's gonna happen, and then it goes, like, ca-chunk!
translation.zh: ‎有时候好像没出水 然后突然噗

translation.en: And then... Pssh! Like, it spits right in your eye.
Are you, like, an actress or something?
Filmmaker.
Good for you.
It's a very tough town.
It takes years just to get a break.
What do you do?
I'm in real estate.
Morning.
-[Christine] Hey, babe. [chuckles] -[Code] Hey.
Get off your butt, Lis. Don't you have that meeting with Lou Burke?
translation.zh:
‎快起床 丽萨
‎你不是要去见劳伯克吗？

translation.en: [Christine] Lou Burke?
[Lisa] Mr. Burke.
Lisa Nova.
Jesus, you're not much older than my son.
translation.zh: ‎老天 你比我儿子大不了多少

translation.en: Sit. [clears throat]
And call me Lou. Never Mr. Burke.
translation.zh: ‎叫我劳 不要叫我伯克先生

translation.en: Okay. Lou. How'd you get my short film?
translation.zh:
‎好的 劳 你是怎么发现
‎我的电影短片？

translation.en: I sent it to a few people, but--
You know those nights you wake up every 20 minutes from a different dream?
translation.zh:
‎每晚每隔20分钟从不同的梦中醒来
‎这种感觉你懂吗？

translation.en: My wife thinks I should see a sleep guy, but I love my dreams.
translation.zh:
‎我太太觉得我应该去看睡眠专家
‎但是我喜欢我的梦

translation.en: I dream about the birds. Oh, hello. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎我梦到鸟 你好 谢谢

translation.en: Falcons, actually.
I raise Arctic Peregrines. Like nature's 200-mile-an-hour missile.
translation.zh:
‎我养北极猎鹰
‎它们就像自然界时速300公里的导弹

translation.en: I had three, but one killed Glenn Close's Pekingese,
translation.zh:
‎我曾经有三只
‎但是一只咬死了格伦克洛斯的哈巴狗

translation.en: and now I've got two. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎现在只剩两只了 谢谢你

translation.en: You're having coffee with sushi.
I drink this coffee with everything. Comayagua!
translation.zh: ‎从我吃什么都配咖啡 科马亚瓜！

translation.en: Ship it in from Honduras.
My assistant makes sure my favorite spots have it on hand.
translation.zh:
‎我的助理确保
‎所有我喜欢的餐厅都有这个

translation.en: -Very cool. So-- -What's your story?
translation.zh:
‎-很酷 所以…
‎-说说你的故事吧

translation.en: Not from L.A., I take it.
No, I'm from Brazil, actually.
My father is a botanist. He was looking for corpse vines--
translation.zh:
‎我的父亲是个植物学家
‎他在寻找尸藤…

translation.en: I feel like you're flicking puzzle pieces at me.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你在跟我玩拼图游戏

translation.en: -He was looking for a corpse vine? -What are we doing here?
translation.zh:
‎-他在寻找尸藤？
‎-我们来这儿干什么？

translation.en: I wanted to meet you.
That's how meetings work.
[in English] Japanese scallops.
[sighs] I saw a tape sitting on a desk and...
translation.zh: ‎我看到桌子上有一卷录像带…

translation.en: I don't know. I had this voice in my head.
translation.zh:
‎我也搞不清楚
‎我的脑子里有一个声音

translation.en: "Pick up this video tape.
Pick it up."
It's a true story.
That sound crazy? Probably does.
So you liked my movie.
[Lou] So, what do we got?
It's tense.
And scary.
And, um...
My God, that ending.
I mean, those special effects when she...
Well, I don't wanna get too gory over lunch.
So the question is what's the full-length,
major-motion-picture, opens-on-1500-screens-nationwide version?
translation.zh:
‎将要在全国1500家影院上映的完整版
‎是什么样子？

translation.en: Well, what it's really about, to me, is...
this woman.
She's got this thing. But she doesn't know how to use it yet.
translation.zh: ‎她有这种能力 但是不知道如何使用

translation.en: Like a superpower. Right? Her eyes already do that thing.
translation.zh:
‎你指的是超能力？
‎她的眼睛就能施展魔力

translation.en: Yeah, but other people wanna take it from her.
translation.zh: ‎是的 但是其他人想要夺走这种能力

translation.en: They wanna suck her dry and don't care if they kill her in the process.
translation.zh: ‎他们想要榨干她 不管她的死活

translation.en: So this woman, she has to learn how to use this thing against them.
translation.zh:
‎所以这个女人
‎必须学会用该能力对抗他们

translation.en: If she wants to make it out alive.
-Okay. -It's a paranoid thriller.
Woman on the run. Right? I've been looking for something like this.
translation.zh:
‎逃命的女人 对吧？
‎我一直在寻找这类题材

translation.en: Okay, so let's do a director wish list. Right?
translation.zh: ‎我们来探讨一下导演清单吧

translation.en: I'm directing.
Okay.
I mean, a rookie director is a tough sell.
You'd have to sell yourself as a...
young female Cronenberg, uh...
Verhoeven.
Truth is, I've been looking to take more chances.
translation.zh: ‎说实话 我一直在寻求转变

translation.en: You know, maybe you're the chance I've been looking to take.
translation.zh: ‎或许你就是我一直寻找的转机

translation.en: But you need to learn to persuade people that you're the one to make this.
translation.zh: ‎但是你要学会说服别人这是你的作品

translation.en: So you'll help me out.
And that's the thing.
Not everything can be taught. Some things have to be experienced...
translation.zh:
‎有些事情只可意会不可言传
‎你必须亲身经历…

translation.en: Holy fucking shit. Roy Hardaway?
Is that Roy-fucking-Hardaway? Oh, my God! It is!
translation.zh: ‎你是罗伊哈达威吗？天哪！真是你！

translation.en: -How's it going, Lou? Good to see you. -How the fuck are ya, huh?
translation.zh:
‎-你好吗 劳？很高兴见到你
‎-你混得怎么样？

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, Roy, this is Lisa Nova. Lisa Nova, Roy Hardaway.
translation.zh:
‎罗伊 这位是丽萨诺娃
‎丽萨诺娃 他是罗伊哈达威

translation.en: The actor.
I know who he is. Hi.
[Lou] You gotta try the monkfish liver. It's next-level.
translation.zh: ‎你应该尝尝他们的安康鱼肝 超级赞

translation.en: It's mind blowing, like having a woman undress in your mouth.
translation.zh:
‎让人难以置信
‎就像有个女人在你嘴里宽衣解带

translation.en: Am I gonna see you at the Alvin Sender...?
[Roy] Not sure yet. I haven't decided.
-[Roy] It was nice to meet you, Lisa. -Yes. You too.
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴见到你 丽萨
‎-我也是

translation.en: So I'm assuming this is you?
Yes, that's me.
-You living out of this thing? -Actually, yes, I am.
Jesus.
Home sweet home.
Tell you what.
I'm gonna option your short.
We'll make the feature just the way you want it.
translation.zh: ‎我们按照你的意愿拍摄长片

translation.en: Consider this a deposit.
I'll send over a contract. Have a lawyer look it over.
translation.zh: ‎我会把合同发给你 给你的律师看看

translation.en: Okay.
-[engine starts] -Consider an apartment.
Why?
Do you want?
Oh, no, thank you. I'm not hungry, but thanks.
translation.zh: ‎不用了多谢 我不饿 但谢谢你

translation.en: When the bandages come off, she'll look like Daryl Hannah.
translation.zh:
‎等拆掉纱布
‎她就会变成达里尔汉娜了

translation.en: Cher wasn't built in a day.
So is it legit?
Nothing seems shady.
You should get a lawyer.
[Lisa] I can't afford one.
Jules says it looks legit.
Well, if Jules Brandenberg says so.
translation.zh: ‎朱尔斯布兰登伯格说行就行

translation.en: I know what a contract looks like. I have a movie in development.
translation.zh: ‎我知道合同长什么样 我正在拍电影

translation.en: -He directed our video, babe. -Meaningless.
translation.zh:
‎-我们的视频就是他导的 宝贝
‎-说明不了什么

translation.en: You're gonna be huge, baby.
[mouths] Thank you.
Lou Burke. Wow.
He hasn't had a hit in a few years, but I love Breaking Point.
translation.zh:
‎他已经好多年没有卖座电影了
‎不过我挺喜欢《突破点》的

translation.en: Good for you.
Thanks. So does the contract protect me as the director?
translation.zh: ‎多谢 合同保障我做导演的权力吗？

translation.en: Can I be fired?
No producer hires a director they can't replace if the director sucks.
translation.zh:
‎如果导演能力不行
‎任何一个制片人都不会手下留情的

translation.en: In theory, they could fire Steven Spielberg if they want to.
translation.zh:
‎理论上来讲
‎他们甚至可以开除史蒂芬斯皮尔伯格

translation.en: But, yeah,
this says, you, Lisa Natasha Nova, are directing the movie.
translation.zh: ‎上面说你 丽萨娜塔莎诺娃导演此片

translation.en: Just don't suck.
You think I could meet him?
[Christine] It's kind of a shithole, but you can't afford anything that isn't.
translation.zh: ‎这里环境很差 不过好的你也付不起

translation.en: The great news is it's furnished.
Or someone abandoned the furniture in here.
But either way, you can use it.
I love this place.
Careful at night. There's coyotes all around here.
translation.zh: ‎晚上注意安全 附近有很多土狼

translation.en: -There's whats? -Coyotes.
They're fucking dangerous.
Feels kinda haunted.
Maybe you'll hear some silent film actress sobbing all night.
translation.zh: ‎或许你能听到默剧演员整晚的啜泣

translation.en: Maybe she slit her wrists in the clawfoot tub.
translation.zh: ‎也许她在贵妃浴缸中划破了手腕

translation.en: [Christine] Not a clawfoot.
I always wanted a penthouse.
translation.zh: ‎我一直梦想着一套楼顶套间

translation.en: [Christine] The top floor of a walkup is not a penthouse.
translation.zh: ‎平价公寓的顶层不是楼顶套间

translation.en: [whispers] Coyotes.
[whispers] Coyotes.
[Lou] So let's talk about Lisa Nova.
Can you sell me Lisa Nova?
translation.zh: ‎你能激起我对丽萨诺娃的兴趣吗？

translation.en: You mean sell my movie idea?
No, actually, I don't. Everybody's got an idea.
translation.zh: ‎不 不是这个 想法人人都有

translation.en: There's only one you.
So who are you?
Sell yourself to me.
Okay.
So, I'm sure you hear this all the time, but I'm not like every other director.
translation.zh:
‎我想这些话你肯定听过无数遍
‎但是我和别的导演不一样

translation.en: Oh, you're not?
I witness a murder. Right?
translation.zh: ‎我目击过一场谋杀 知道吗？

translation.en: I saw the guy. Got a good look at him. Now all the cops are standing around,
translation.zh:
‎我看到一个家伙 我看得很清楚
‎周围站着很多警察

translation.en: the sketch artist has her pad and her pencils,
and everyone's waiting with bated breath and I say,
translation.zh: ‎所有人都不敢大口呼吸 我说

translation.en: "The killer was not like a jellyfish."
-Don't tell me what you're not. -Copy that.
Don't worry, you're still young. We'll keep going until we get it right.
translation.zh:
‎别担心 你还年轻
‎我们会一直继续直到我们把卖点想好

translation.en: ♪ Even the air in here has jelled ♪
-[Lou] You okay? You look tired. -[Lisa] I didn't get much sleep.
translation.zh:
‎-你没事儿吧？看上去很累
‎-我没怎么睡觉

translation.en: [Lou] Go again. Go.
I grew up loving movies.
When I was a kid, in São Conrado, my dad had a projector,
translation.zh:
‎我小的时候在圣孔拉多
‎我爸爸有一个投影仪

translation.en: -and I used to watch-- -Let me tell you about a guy.
translation.zh:
‎-我总是爱看…
‎-我跟你说一个人

translation.en: His name's Alvin Sender, and he's rich as sin.
translation.zh: ‎他叫阿尔文桑德 超级有钱

translation.en: What makes him unique is he loves finding new talent.
translation.zh:
‎他的与众不同之处在于
‎他热衷于寻找人才

translation.en: You know the Sex, Lies, and Videotape kid? Alvin's financing his next project.
translation.zh:
‎你知道《性谎言录像带》的作者吗？
‎阿尔文正在赞助他的下一部作品

translation.en: Problem is a lot of people ask Alvin for money.
translation.zh: ‎问题是很多人想要阿尔文的赞助

translation.en: And believe me when I tell you, they all grew up loving movies.
translation.zh: ‎相信我 所有人都是从小就热爱电影

translation.en: So, what makes you different?
Maybe I'm just not good at this whole pitching myself thing.
When I was a kid, I was in a really bad accident.
translation.zh: ‎我小的时候经历过一场严重意外

translation.en: Stuck in a bed for the better part of a year.
Worst part, I couldn't go to the movies.
translation.zh: ‎最要命的是我不能去看电影

translation.en: And a movie theater was my church, it was everything to me.
translation.zh: ‎电影院就像是我的教堂 是我的一切

translation.en: So I'd have to imagine the movies I wanted to see, beginning to end.
translation.zh:
‎所以我不得不想象那些我想看的电影
‎从开头到结尾

translation.en: But to this day, I firmly believe
that accident is the only reason I have three Oscars to polish.
translation.zh:
‎那场意外
‎是我获得三次奥斯卡奖的唯一原因

translation.en: Because I had a North Star.
Would that kid in that hospital bed wanna see this movie?
translation.zh:
‎那个病床上的孩子
‎会想看这部电影吗？

translation.en: That kid was my audience.
Who's yours?
Let's go for a drive.
What are you thinking about?
My mom.
What about her?
You asked who my audience is.
[Lou] She must be an interesting lady.
translation.zh: ‎她肯定是一个有故事的女士

translation.en: [Lisa] I wouldn't know.
Never met her.
She left right after I was born.
I know what I'm about to say is gonna sound crazy.
translation.zh: ‎我知道我要说的话听起来很不可思议

translation.en: Actually never said it out loud before but...
translation.zh:
‎实际上我从来没有大声说出来过
‎不过…

translation.en: I feel like if I can make my film,
translation.zh: ‎我想如果我能拍一部自己的电影

translation.en: somehow, she'll see it.
And she'll know it came from me.
That's beautiful.
You know, I could walk this into a studio a lot easier without you,
translation.zh: ‎你知道 我自己去制片厂更好办事

translation.en: or take it to Alvin with some hotshot music video director,
translation.zh: ‎或者拿给阿尔文和其他当红的导演

translation.en: but it's about relevance.
You know?
You only get so many bites at the apple.
A year in this business is like a decade, and I haven't...
translation.zh: ‎干这一行 一年顶十年 我已经…

translation.en: I haven't had a real hit since 1986.
I don't wanna know what it's like to disappear.
I need you.
That's the truth.
So Saturday night, Alvin Sender's having a thing at his gallery.
translation.zh:
‎周六晚上
‎阿尔文要在他的画廊举行活动

translation.en: Movie people, movie stars.
Be a great opportunity to meet Alvin.
It's a date.
[Lou] Well, this should be fun.
We're going as a team.
I'll build you up, get Alvin on your side.
translation.zh: ‎我会为你站台 引起阿尔文的兴趣

translation.en: And then when you have the official meeting,
he'll know who you are. Right?
And then when you walk out of that meeting, you'll have a movie.
translation.zh:
‎正式会面之后
‎你就有属于自己的电影了

translation.en: Thanks.
Whatever happens, thanks for everything.
translation.zh: ‎不管结果如何 谢谢你所做的一切

translation.en: [Lou] My pleasure.
I think we make a good team.
I'm sorry. I thought, um...
I'm sorry.
I think we make a good team too.
What's Alvin Sender look like?
[Lou] Like a rich guy.
You know, the masks read your brain waves and turn them into these little movies.
translation.zh:
‎那些面具能读懂他们的脑电波
‎然后转化成小电影

translation.en: Stay here and look cool.
Here you are.
This thing creeps me out.
I know it's bullshit, but I don't want the world to have a window into my mind.
translation.zh:
‎我知道这很胡扯
‎但是我不想被全世界看透

translation.en: [Lisa] I love it.
What would somebody see if they looked through your window?
translation.zh:
‎如果别人能看穿你的大脑
‎他们会看到什么？

translation.en: I guess it depends on who's looking.
You know that woman?
She's been watching you since you've walked in.
translation.zh: ‎从你进来她就开始盯着你看

translation.en: She's probably trying to figure out where you are in the food chain.
translation.zh: ‎她可能想知道你在食物链中的等级

translation.en: See you around, maybe.
I've been waiting for the right moment to say hello.
translation.zh: ‎我一直在等机会跟你打招呼

translation.en: Do you know me?
The man you came in with is having a very important conversation without you.
translation.zh:
‎那个和你一起来的男人
‎正在背着你谈重要的事

translation.en: Who are you?
I'm Boro.
What do you want?
To offer my services.
What is it you do?
For you? I could hurt someone.
How?
Will you hold my cat?
-Uh... -Here. Aww....
Okay, baby.
Sometimes, I imagine I'm inside him like he's a house.
translation.zh:
‎有时候我想象自己住在它里面
‎好像它是一座房子

translation.en: You could do that.
Imagine you're inside someone. Say, the man you came here with.
translation.zh:
‎想象你住在某个人里面
‎比如那个和你一起来的人

translation.en: -Inside of him? -Yes.
Imagine that.
Like he's a house and you're wandering around.
translation.zh: ‎想象他是一座房子 你在里面闲逛

translation.en: Are you doing it?
Yeah.
No. No, you're not.
Okay.
Imagine...
that you're inside him.
You feel it?
Now, break something.
Done.
-[cat meows] -Oh, yes. I know.
I know.
Here.
